name: International Institute of Market Research and Analytics (IIMRA)
overview:
International Institute of Market research and analytics (IIMRA) International Institute of Market research and analytics (IIMRA) is a market research training institute, has operations in 4 continents and in over 15 countries. IIMRA has been established in 1987 to provide market research education to our changing society in a global economy. IIMRA has grown to become the “gold standard” to which all others are compared in the market research training.

IIMRA has a rich heritage of grooming young and experienced minds into experts in the vast and deepened field of Market research. Although not conspicuous to the end consumer, market research helps in designing the products they buy, price they can pay, the ads they see thus market research is vital in the current market situation. In its 25 years since IIMRA’s entry the academy has trained and mentored numerous students and industrial participants and shaped them to understand, analyse and implement the best practices and capture the potential of Market Research.

IIMRA offers the following certification courses worldwide

Certified-Market Research Analyst Certified Business Analyst Certified Market Research Professional Certified Data Analyst Certified Financial Analyst

-IIMRA inspire research professionals with powerful events and conferences. -IIMRA sharpen the skills and boost credibility through comprehensive market research and analytics development courses. Our market leading intelligence helps to share the latest techniques for effective evidence generation.

IIMRA faculty members are drawn from leading consulting and technology firms. IIMRA’s student base is made up of employees of multinational corporations, foreign direct and portfolio investors, government bodies, multilateral organizations and general public.
